meanings.definition: Meet again after a period of separation.
meanings.sent1: I hope to reencounter my childhood friend at the school reunion.
meanings.sent2: After years apart, they finally reencountered at the airport.
meanings.sent3: It was a pleasant surprise to reencounter my lost keys in the couch cushions.
meanings.sent4: The old friends reencountered like long-lost siblings, embracing warmly.
meanings.sent5: The reencounter with her favorite book brought back cherished memories.

meanings.definition: Come across or meet by chance again.
meanings.sent1: While hiking, we reencountered the friendly dog we had seen earlier.
meanings.sent2: During the trip, they reencountered an old classmate unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: The lost ring was reencountered in the most unexpected place - the fridge!
meanings.sent4: As fate would have it, they reencountered at the same coffee shop every morning.
meanings.sent5: The reencounter with the rare bird left them in awe of nature's beauty.
